DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 27 Community Health Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 17:23 IST
 District Health Society
 27 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Gujarat |  Salary : 19,000 to 75,000




FOLLOW

The District Health Society Dahod (DHS Dahod) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 27 Community Health Officers, Medical Officers, and Audiologist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing, MBBS, BAMS, B.Sc, and Any Degree can apply for the DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Gujarat.

DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Community Health Officer	25	GNM, B.Sc Nursing, BAMS
Medical Officer	01	MBBS
Audiologist	01	Any Degree, B.Sc

DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 19,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 75,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025.
Go to the official website.
Visit the DHS Dahod Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	23-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
